summary: A set of lightweight Ansible action plugins that act as thin wrappers around platformâ€‘specific modules (EOS, IOS, VyOS) and a generic echo helper, enabling tasks to be executed within the proper module context during integration tests of the test collection.
business_intent: Provide reusable action entry points for network device platforms and a simple echo utility to support automated integration testing of module defaults, ensuring consistent behavior across different network operating systems.
